nodes.documentation:
Create a simple auction with `_biddingTime`
 seconds bidding time on behalf of the
 beneficiary address `_beneficiary`.
nodes.name: Auction

nodes.documentation:
Bid on the auction with the value sent
 together with this transaction.
 The value will only be refunded if the
 auction is not won.
nodes.name: bid

nodes.documentation: Withdraw a bid that was overbid.
nodes.name: refundBid

nodes.documentation: End the auction and set state to locked
nodes.name: auctionEnd
